column1: Regular traffic reports will resume Tuesday January 5 at 4:00 p.m.

column3: I-75S at 68 MM in Rockcastle Co:
column4: The roadway is reportedly shutdown about 8 miles south of Berea / Exit 76 until further notice due to an overturned semi.

column3: I-75S at 68 MM in Rockcastle Co:
column4: Detour:  Berea/Exit 76 -> left on Hwy 21 -> right on US-25S to Exit 62/Mt Vernon -> back on I-75S.  Expect long delays.
